metadata.Title: CVE-2018-4278 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
In Safari before 11.1.2, iTunes before 12.8 for Windows, iOS before 11.4.1,tvOS before 11.4.1, iCloud for Windows before 7.6, sound fetched throughaudio elements may be exfiltrated cross-origin. This issue was addressedwith improved audio taint tracking.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-4278` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.20.5-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.20.5-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.20.5-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.20.5-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.20.5-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37-gtk2 - 2.20.5-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.20.5-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: webkitgtk package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
webkit2gtk package in esm-infra/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.20.5-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
qtwebkit-source package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
